name: SandChess
description:
This is a turn-based strategy game that you can play with two players on one screen or single against an artificial intelligence.

Your goal is to have more tags than your opponent.

You can chose to play defensive or/and play aggressive to get a maximum amount of tags.

The game takes place on a 81 cell game board leading in way too many strategies.

The attack takes the form of an OXO, the central pawn being replaced by an O.

During the game you will be able to collect and use bonuses, for now the game have two different bonuses :
- Range bonus wich allows you to place your tag anywhere on the board.
- Swap bonus wich allows you to replace an opponent tag with yours

All along the game, some cells will be fortified and become insensible to the swap bonus
